resources.string: Keep your medical records secure and updated
Prescription check for the drug related issues to avoid unexpected discomfort
A quick check for drugs’ side effects and allergies, monitoring, prevention and special advises
Complete information on disease, drugs and lifestyle for better cure
Short-term and long-term services for better recovery and improved clinical outcomes and health-related quality of life
To see the welcome slider again, goto Settings -> apps -> welcome slider -> clear data
This number is not being registered.Please register here...
MySCOPE is an internet based utility setup by Soarg Technologies Ltd for the individuals to create and manage their health information.
Please read these Terms and Condition carefully. By clicking \"I agree\" to these Terms of Agreement, you are indicating that you have read, and you agree to be bound by, these Terms of Agreement.
INFORMATION WE COLLECT/HOW WE USE YOUR INFORMATION:

In order to register you as a user of MySCOPE, we collect certain personal information, Health Information or Contact information from you at the time of registration. We will use your information to register, manage and run your account. No one else can have an access to your health records without your permission. Your entered information/health records at MySCOPE are absolutely safe and secure.
TO WHOM THIS INFORMATION IS DISCLOSED:

When you become a user of MySCOPE, you are allowed to enter your personal information or the personal information of family members in your Personal Health Record (PHR). Information is stored on secured web servers. Only Friends & Family, Health Care Provider, third parties working on our behalf have access to this information if you specifically authorize access to them.

This website is used solely for user’s personal use .Unauthorized use of this website, including but not limited to, unauthorized entry into systems, misuse of passwords, or misuse of any other information is strictly prohibited. Health Care Providers cannot modify, copy, paste, and distribute the information sent by user except that you may view the shared information in its present form for opinion/advice. The content which is for informational purposes is not meant for emergencies.
POLICY WITH REGARD TO YOUR CONTENT:

You are the only one who controls the data contained in your account and your health information would remain stored in MySCOPE for 2 years, from the date of upload and further extension will be based on subscription bases. Your information will not be sold to outside vendors and will be used only for the purpose you intend. As such, you may add, update, delete or change the information in those records at any time. Your family & friends, Health Care Provider can view your health records stored at MySCOPE only if you provide an access to them. You can also fix the duration for which your family & friends, Health Care Provider can view your health records.

Free Storage space of 1GB data for 2 year for active Users. For Inactive user who had not login or used MySCOPE App for a period of 1 year the stored data/upload Files/Images will not be available post inactivation. Only personal Information will remain

· Agree that you are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality and security of username and passwords associated with your account. You are responsible for any consequences arising from or relating to the sharing of, or your accidental disclosure of, your user username or password to access your account.
· Please do not self-medicate and In case of emergency you should consult your physician or other qualified health care provider.

· You may choose to disclose information through website to a family member, friend, health care provider, researcher, marketer, or other person or entity. You should consider such a disclosure carefully before allowing it. Once you disclose or grant access to your information to any third party, these Terms of Agreement and Privacy Statement will not apply to the third party\'s uses and disclosures of your information.
· Report the Support team immediately if you suspect that the security of your account may have been compromised.
· To create an individual personal account into MySCOPE, you must be 18 years of age or older.
· Seek explicit consent from dependent, family members etc. before creating his/her profile.
This website contains information which is provided by third parties. It does not warrant the accuracy or reliability of any information provided by a third party for display on this website.
All health-related information (Health Tips) contained within website is intended to be general in nature and should not be used as a substitute for medical treatment by a health care professional.

MySCOPE enables you to store your health related information in one place. It can help you keep track of this information in a convenient way and more easily share it with your health care providers. The accuracy, integrity and completeness of the health information you enter? Or that you allow others such as your doctor to enter for opinion? Into your \"Record Database\" is your responsibility and we assume no liability for it. We also are not liable for any use or misuse of information transmitted or received by a third party you have authorized to access.

br.font: What is this? \n\n

Patient counseling is the process of providing crucial information, advice, and assistance to help patients take their medications appropriately. It also covers the information about your disease condition and lifestyle changes needed to reduce the poor health outcomes.\n \n
Why you need this? \n\n

Patient knowledge about his/her illness is very important to manage the condition, especially in the case of chronic diseases like diabetes, heart diseases, and cancer, etc. Patient counseling makes the patient aware of the medications, and drug-related problems and necessary lifestyle changes need to cure the condition and enhance compliance.\n \n
How will SCOPE help? \n\n

About his / hrug-related Counseling [Patient shall be made aware aer drugs prescribed by physician/specialist, directions about how to take a medication, precautions like adverse effects, interactions, drug monitoring and managing missed doses and other drug-related problems]

Disease-related Counseling [Counseling related to disease, risk factors, symptoms, diagnostic tests, complications, preventive measures and understanding the disease-related emergencies to monitor]

Lifestyle-related Counseling [Counseling about food to be taken, food to be avoided, exercise advice, stress management, Counseling for alcohol and smoking behavior]

Caregiver Instructions [Patient's attendee (s) will be informed about the proper preventive and monitoring measures to be taken at home related to disease, medications, food, and lifestyle, etc.]

Counseling about self-monitoring [In some unusual conditions, Patient need to know the self-monitoring tools and techniques like weight management, fluid and salt intake management, etc.]

Special aids assistance [like Insulin pens, eye drops, ear drops, inhalers, Rota haler, etc.]

Patient compliance counseling [How to adjust to the medications prescribed to the Patient? timings and alert system about the medicine for the right dose and right time, about prescription filling, etc.]
The Scenario where we help? \n\n
Drug-related issues, Disease information, self-monitoring, attendee\'s issues about patient\'s condition, special assistance, lifestyle-related issues, food, and drug information, etc\n \n
What is this? \n\n

A drug interaction is a change in the effect of the drug by other drug or food administered along with or by an existing disease. In most of the cases, it worsens the condition and causes unexpected discomfort to patient and attendee. \n
Why you need this? \n\n

A drug-interaction check will help you to understand the possible interactions of your prescribed drugs with other concomitant administered medicines and food. If your prescription contains more than three medications or you are on the pills for more than one disease, you may need a quick drug-interaction check to avoid unwanted discomfort.\n \n
How will SCOPE help? \n\n

We will check your prescription for possible drug-drug interactions, drug-food interactions, drug-disease interactions, which will help you and your doctor to understand the nature of onset and severity of drug interaction effect, probable mechanism, and suggested clinical management.\n \n
The Scenario where we help? \n\n

Drug-food interactions: Waferin and food containing vitamin k (green leafy vegetables); Insulin or diabetic drugs and alcohol; Statins and grapefruit etc 

Drug-drug-interactions: Warfarin and clopidogrel; Phenytoin and omeprazole, etc. 

Drug-disease interactions: Cancer medicines increase the risk of heart problems, etc. 

Disease-disease interactions: Kidney failure increase the risk of heart attack, etc.
What is this? \n\n
A prescription audit is a multilevel approach that is necessary to improve patient care. It is a full check of your prescription for the drug and disease-related issues. \n
Why you need this? \n\n

The prescription audit is a must for all the patients after receiving a prescription and before taking medications. You need a prescription inspection to identify and avoid or manage the medication errors, interactions, and contraindication issues that usually occur if you are on multiple drugs.\n \n
How will SCOPE help? \n\n
We will check your prescription for medication errors, contraindications, drug-interaction, incomplete or inadequate prescription, drug duplication issues, and other drug-related problems. \n
The Scenario where we help? \n\n
Missed doses, missed units, drug interactions with other drugs, food to be avoided, adverse effects, duplicate drugs, and other drug-related issues \n
What is this? \n\n

An adverse drug event is an injury or problem that occurred to the patient because of administered medicine. It could be because of medication errors, drug reactions, allergic reactions, and/or overdoses. It can happen during hospitalization, out-patient setting, or post-discharge at home. \n
Why you need this? \n\n

You need an adverse drug event monitoring assessment to identify the possible side effects associated with your medications. It will help in avoiding or preventing future risk of adverse events. It will help you to understand emergencies if they occur because of the adverse effects of the drug.\n \n
How will SCOPE help? \n\n
We will check your drugs for side effects and allergies and counsel you about monitoring of side effects, preventive measures to be taken, and specific advice related to drugs, etc. \n
The Scenario where we help? \n\n
Allergies, giddiness, vomiting, headache, hypotension, hypoglycemia and low electrolyte levels, etc \n
What is this? \n\n

Post-discharge care includes the short-term and long-term services required by the patient for better recovery and to improve clinical outcomes and health-related quality of life. It includes all the services like prescription audit, patient counseling, patient compliance assessment, medication adherence, and prescription refill alerts \n
Why you need this? \n\n

When your doctor is not around, SCOPE is there to help you, and the services are required at home after hospital discharge. Post-discharge care keeps you alert about the medications, interactions, compliance, self-monitoring, emergency management of adverse events or other drug-related problems, food, prescription refiling, and lifestyle modifications, doctors appointments, etc.\n \n
How will SCOPE help? \n\n

The SCOPE healthcare team will help to deliver patient-centered post-discharge care management, which will cover patient counseling, prescription audit, drug interactions, and side effect monitoring, drug and refill alerts, outcome assessment, query-check, and other Patient-related questions. \n
The Scenario where we help? \n\n

Single-living status, medication complexity, multiple medications, multiple disease condition, busy schedules, self-monitoring, home-care, drug-related queries, medication adherence, outcome assessment, prescription refill updates, etc \n

resources.string: My Scope technical team will get back to you soon.In case of emergency you can mail to info@scopemedics.com
